resources.string: AppendixC
dismiss
Type the word dismiss to have the keyboard hide itself.
Loading
Loading complete
Refresh
Press the refresh button
Section Detail
Looks like you have a very large tablet.
Ah, a large tablet, excellent choice!
Your device size seems pretty normal.
Yikes, you have a small device.
Your device is very confusing.
Mmm, you have a lot of pixels looking at you.
XHDPI displays are quite nice.
HDPI displays are slowly becoming extinct.
Hopefully this is just your testing device because MDPI just does not cut it anymore.
Oh no, you are stuck with an LDPI display.
Are you really testing this on a TV?
I can\'t tell how dense your display is. Either the pixels are teeny tiny or gigantic.
On the main/UI thread!
On a background thread!
The device has a connection on resume
The device does not have a connection on resume
Loading indicator
A determinate Activity loading indicator
Loading indicator refresh
A refresh button in the action bar that can indicate loading
Dismiss keyboard
An EditText that can dismiss the keyboard
Various demos
Demos of keeping the screen on, device physical size, device density, checking network connection, and checking if on the UI thread
Custom view
A view that demonstrates using custom attributes
